md:
giải nghĩa từ "flared" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Flared (verb) /flɛərd/:
	+ Meaning: to become wider or more spread out at one end; to increase suddenly and strongly.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example: The fire flared up suddenly, illuminating the dark room.
	+ Related words: flare, blaze, burst, explode
	+ Antonyms: dwindled, decreased, reduced

* Flared (adjective) /flɛərd/:
	+ Meaning: having a shape that becomes wider or more spread out at one end.
	+ Type: adjective
	+ Example: The flared jeans were a fashion trend in the 1970s.
	+ Related words: bell-bottom, wide-legged, tapered
	+ Antonyms: narrow, tapered, slim

Note: The verb "flared" can also be used to describe a sudden increase in intensity or activity, such as a flared temper or a flared argument.
